page.title: 02HOUSING IN N.FERRIBY.
page.content: In North Ferriby well over 100 houses are semi-detached, with over 50 detached houses. There are hardly any flats in the village and very few bungalows. A vast majority of the houses in the village are between 60 and 100 years old. The oldest house in Ferriby is around 886 years old. Most of the houses are owner occupied with very few rented and none are leased. In Ferriby many people have moved here in the last 25 years for various reasons, like jobs and the surrounding countryside. A few have lived here all their lives. On average 4 people live in each house in North Ferriby, the highest being 8 in one house. Most of the children go to North Ferriby school. Unfortunately there are quite a few unemployed people.Many people in Ferriby seem to belong to the professional job categories.
